title: Phosphate sensitivity
description: Each Nemesis exposed to Fire extinguisher or Fire Control Center action, falls back and takes 1 damage

title: Way of combat
description: If an adult Nemesis attack you by Bite, you suffer shallow wound instead of severe one

title: Energy sensitivity
description: Each energy weapon attack that deals 1 damage, deals 1 additional damage

title: Fire sensitivity
description: When Nemesis suffers from fire, Molotov cocktail or Flamethrower, it takes 1 additional damage

title: Mobility
description: Apart from Queen and Breeders, no other Nemesis can destroy closed doors

title: Stress reaction
description: During Surprise attack, Nemesis' Danger token value is reduced by 1 (to min. 1)

title: Vitality
description: Empty Attack roll again adult Nemesis' is treated as 1 damage

title: Endangered species
description: Damage amount required to kill Nemesis is reduced by 1
